pullRequest.title: Box selection when moving to x2,y2,z2 coordinates
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
Fixed the bug where box selection doesn't work properly when not at the x,y,z coordinates (moving towards x2,y2,z2 coordinates). This was caused by a mismatch in mix ratio ranges where the code was expecting a different range to what it was actually receiving.
Alternate Designs

Why Should This Be In Core?

Benefits
Users can box select properly regardless of the number of times PgUp and PgDn are pressed
Possible Drawbacks

Verification Process

Opened a new graph and created a few nodes in different places
Verified I could box select each node both individually and all together
Pressed PgUp a few times and ran the same verification process as in step 2. Did this a few times for different number of PgUps and PgDns
Added some transactions and did the same thing

Applicable Issues
#389

commit.message: fixed box selection issue when moving to x2,y2,z2 coordinates

nodes.bodyText: it looks like camera provides a method for doing this in Camera#getMix() - this would avoid the magic number.
